sources.title: Hey, Humans (Āy Ādamha) (2015)
sources.description: Hey, Humans (Āy Ādamha) (2015) A documentary Directed by Rakhshan Banietemad tirgan.ca Synopsis: Through the charity organization, “Chain of Hope”, a team of volunteer Iranian and French medical doctors treat underprivileged child patients from all over Iran in three branches of cardiac, orthopaedics and rehabilitation to the highest standards. Credits: Director Rakhshan Banietemad / Researcher & Editor Shirin Barghnavard/ Cinematographers Mohammad Reza Jahanpanah, Mohammad Hadadi/ Sound Recordists Yadollah Nafafi Rashid Daneh / Sound Designer Ensieh Maleki /Composer Siamak kalantari/ SongperformerHaana Kamkar / Color Grading Hamidreza Fatourehchian, Sindokht Rahimian / Production Manager Abed Nicpoo / Still Photographer Abbas Kowsari / Credits Designer Amir Esbati/ Graphic Designer Shirin Afrand With the participation of child patients, medical team and volunteers at Chain of Hope Institute Producer Rakhshan BanietemadA Product of KARA Film Studio Duration: 66 min  Language: Persian with English Subtitles  Region: Iran WHEN: Saturday, 29 Jul 2017 - 03:30 PM WHERE: Studio Theatre Harbourfront Centre Rakhshan Banietemad
